definition: a symptom consisting of the involuntary expulsion of air from the nose, exhale spasmodically, as when an irritant entered one's nose
details:
noun
- a symptom consisting of the involuntary expulsion of air from the nose
= synonyms: sneezing, sternutation
verb
- exhale spasmodically, as when an irritant entered one's nose
= example: exhale spasmodically, as when an irritant entered one's nose
